DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the relative bioavailability of Nadolol (1 x 80 mg) tablets under fasting conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability Study of Nadolol (1 x 80 mg) Tablets Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.criteria: No clinically significant abnormal finding on physical exam, medical history, or clinical laboratory results on screening. Positive test results for HIV or hepatitis B or C. Treatment for drug or alcohol dependence.
